WorkItem.Description:
Hi , ı was using rawr with my Frost Dk but after some items chances its not working now . When I try to start optimize its not calculating just stopping not givin any error or warning . I m using for my other chars have no problem with same 4.3.1 version . I try on 3 diffrent notebook and pc and web based version    , also I try with getting data from addon or blizzard web page . Is there any one got same problem or is there any way to fix it ?
 
Thanks .
 
Best RGDS.

Comments.Message: Can you upload character file you're having problems with?

Eu - Neptulon - Zeru u can try with download from web . dont need file its not working with this way too . I m ataching file too , I m using only equiped and carried items option if ı m using addon  , if use all items its mixing with items in bank and its using tank items if its better then dps ones .

Via SL release build: Loading the attached character via addon, loads the character and I can save the character file to XML.  However, running the Optimizer crashes SL.  (didn't try changing items yet).
I'll look into it in the debugger and see what is causing the issue.
Locally: I see crash only w/ Firefox.  Everything runs fine w/ IE.  Looking deeper.

Certainly, there are some issues w/ what you have equipped  - EG you should not be stacking FC on both hands.  You should be using RazorIce on MH and FC on Off-hand.  FC is a PPM that is not dependent upon weapon speed at all.  But that doesn't seem to be the problem, based on what I'm seeing locally.  Hmmm.
Problem is when select MH Treachery' Bite as uniq its not working , if I dont select it uniq and optimize its working . Maybe this can help to solve main problem .
